message.content:
1. DPN is defined as Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument (MNSI) clinical examination score >2.
2. DPN was assessed at baseline.
3. DPN was assessed yearly.
4. The yearly assessment of DPN lasted for 4 years.

messages.content:
Statement: DPN (defined as Michigan Neuropathy Screening Instrument [MNSI] clinical examination score >2) was assessed at baseline and yearly for 4 years.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
